thread.title: Burger King Just Bought Popeyes For $1.8 Billion
thread.title_full: Burger King Just Bought Popeyes For $1.8 Billion

author: Brandon Wenerd
title: Burger King Just Bought Popeyes For $1.8 Billion
text:
Originally started in New Orleans, Popeyes makes the best damn fast food friend chicken on the planet. They have over 2,600 restaurants in the U.S., all serving up incredible red beans and rice and delicious spicy chicken. As of today, it belongs to the Burger King family of restaurants after a $1.6 billion cash-stock acquisition from Restaurant Brands International, the company that owns BK and Tim Hortons in Canada. Fans of the chicken chain are hoping BK keeps it exactly how it is because Popeyes is literally perfect:
All I know is Burger King better leave that Popeyes recipe exactly how they found it
— (@Ride4Black) February 21, 2017 

Personally, I’m excited for the possibility of a I-95 rest stop that has all three of these things:
Burgers and doughnuts + fried chicken? Burger King & Tim Hortons owner Restaurant Brands Intl approached Popeyes about buying it. -Reuters pic.twitter.com/lGEcNySV4Q 
— Richard Dettman (@rwdettman) February 13, 2017 

And share prices in Popeyes are currently BOOMING:
